title: Funds
context: §181-10 Funds. All fees and fines collected under this chapter and all moneys forfeited under any bond or deposit shall be paid into the treasury of the State as general realizations. [L 1957, c 161, §11; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §21; am L 1961, c 132, §2; Supp, §98C-11; HRS §181-10; am L 1993, c 280, §50]
